source(output(
		cdm_companycode as string,
		cdm_companyid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['CDSCompanies.csv']) ~> CDSCompanies
source(output(
		msdyn_groupid as string,
		msdyn_customergroupidCE as string,
		msdyn_companyCE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['02_02_CDSCustomerGroups.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CDSCustomerGroups
source(output(
		customertypecode as string,
		address2_addresstypecode as string,
		merged as string,
		accountnumber as string,
		modifiedby as string,
		statecode as string,
		creditlimit as string,
		address1_latitude as string,
		exchangerate as string,
		openrevenue_state as string,
		name as string,
		address2_city as string,
		opendeals as string,
		address1_county as string,
		modifiedon as string,
		address2_line1 as string,
		msdyn_language as string,
		address1_longitude as string,
		donotpostalmail as string,
		accountratingcode as string,
		numberofemployees as string,
		marketingonly as string,
		msdyn_vendorcreatedbyworkflow as string,
		donotphone as string,
		preferredcontactmethodcode as string,
		ownerid as string,
		customersizecode as string,
		msdyn_onholdstatus as string,
		openrevenue_base as string,
		msdyn_paymentterm as string,
		businesstypecode as string,
		donotemail as string,
		address2_shippingmethodcode as string,
		msdyn_onetimecustomer as string,
		address1_addressid as string,
		address2_freighttermscode as string,
		statuscode as string,
		createdon as string,
		msdyn_travelchargetype as string,
		opendeals_state as string,
		address1_stateorprovince as string,
		msdyn_creditlimitismandatory as string,
		openrevenue as string,
		msdyn_partynumber as string,
		donotsendmm as string,
		donotfax as string,
		msdyn_telephone1description as string,
		msdyn_paymenttermsbasedays as string,
		donotbulkpostalmail as string,
		address1_country as string,
		msdyn_invoiceaddress as string,
		address1_line1 as string,
		msdyn_creditrating as string,
		creditonhold as string,
		telephone1 as string,
		msdyn_customerpaymentmethod as string,
		transactioncurrencyid as string,
		accountid as string,
		address2_postalcode as string,
		address1_addresstypecode as string,
		donotbulkemail as string,
		msdyn_customergroupid as string,
		creditlimit_base as string,
		address2_county as string,
		followemail as string,
		shippingmethodcode as string,
		address2_stateorprovince as string,
		createdby as string,
		address2_latitude as string,
		address1_city as string,
		territorycode as string,
		address2_longitude as string,
		openrevenue_date as string,
		msdyn_taxexempt as string,
		owningteam as string,
		participatesinworkflow as string,
		accountclassificationcode as string,
		owningbusinessunit as string,
		address2_addressid as string,
		address1_postalcode as string,
		address2_country as string,
		msdyn_company as string,
		opendeals_date as string,
		emailaddress1 as string,
		msdyn_emailaddress1description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CDSAccountsExport01
CustAccountLeftOuterJoin, CDSCustomerGroups lookup(cdm_companyid == msdyn_companyCE
	&& CUSTOMERGROUPID == msdyn_groupid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CustomerGroupLookup
CDSCompaniesLookupFO, CDSAccountsExport01 join(CUSTOMERACCOUNT == accountnumber,
	joinType:'left',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CustAccountLeftOuterJoin
FinOpsCustomers, CDSCompanies lookup(DataAreaId == cdm_companycode,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CDSCompaniesLookupFO
CustomerGroupLookup derive(CEAccountId = iifNull(accountid, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')) ~> CEAccountId
CEAccountId sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['00CombinedFile.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AccountsReadyForCDSImport
